title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 4119/87 of 21 December 1987 fixing the storage premium for certain fishery products for the 1988 fishing year
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 4119/87
of 21 December 1987
fixing the storage premium for certain fishery products for the 1988 fishing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1988 fishing year, the storage premium for Norway lobsters and edible crabs shall be as set out in the Annex.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1988.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
